title: Vegetarian mushroom pie
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '150g diced onion', '125g mushrooms (any variety), sliced', '50g button mushrooms, quartered', '350ml vegetable stock', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 medium carrot, diced', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '250g puff pastry, thawed if frozen', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water']
